attributes.action: Shops and restaurants to offer indoor areas for a parent to feed their baby
attributes.additional_details:
Please allow retail shops and hospitality to offer indoor seating for breast and bottle feeding so that mothers do not have to feed their children outside, standing up or even on the floor. 

Somewhere warm and a seat & inside. Social distancing in place, and the parent to return outside once the baby is fed.
attributes.background:
I am asking for parents to be allowed to sit inside while feeding their breast or bottle fed children.

It is far too cold outside & uncomfortable to feed children while no indoor seating is allowed. As a mother of two I’m finding it very hard to leave the house as there is nowhere to feed inside.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583066
